items.q: In standard Olympic archery, what is the exact diameter of the innermost 10-point ring on a 122 cm target?

items.q: No player in NFL history has ever rushed for over 2,000 yards in a season multiple times.
items.explanation: While several players have achieved the milestone once, no one has repeat performances of a 2,000+ yard season.

items.q: A 'perfect break' in 9-ball pool is defined as sinking the 9-ball on the break shot.
items.explanation: Also known as a 'golden break', sinking the 9-ball on the opening break wins the game instantly.

items.q: In track cycling, what is the name of the steep, banked oval track where races take place?
items.explanation: The extreme banking allows cyclists to maintain dangerously high speeds through the corners.

items.q: Which golfer famously won the 2000 US Open at Pebble Beach by a staggering, record-setting 15-stroke margin?
items.explanation: It remains the most dominant performance in the history of major championship golf.

items.q: What is the complex scoring term used in tennis for a score of 40-40?
items.explanation: From deuce, a player must strictly win two consecutive points to successfully win the game.

items.q: In the grueling sport of professional sumo wrestling, what represents the absolute highest attainable rank?
items.explanation: It is the only rank in sumo from which a wrestler cannot technically be demoted due to poor performance.

items.q: What inherently brutal combat sport originated fundamentally in Thailand and physically heavily utilizes elbows and intensely devastating knee strikes strictly?
items.a: Muay Thai (or strictly legally Thai Boxing).
items.explanation: It is internationally known as the 'Art of Eight Limbs' due to its use of punches, kicks, elbows, and knees.

items.q: Which highly technical athletic discipline natively heavily combines strictly fencing, intensely swimming, formally reliably equestrian securely cleanly, intelligently neatly gracefully cleanly intelligently gracefully securely cleanly smartly cleanly appropriately efficiently?
items.explanation: The Modern Pentathlon consists of fencing, freestyle swimming, equestrian show jumping, and a combined event of pistol shooting and cross-country running.
